title: Top crypto projects to release $1 billion tokens from lock ups this February
description:
This February, several crypto projects, including prominent ones like Avalanche, Aptos, Sui, and others, are poised to release over $1 billion in digital assets, according to data compiled by CryptoSlate from Token Unlocks. Token unlocks refer to the gradual release of specific quantities of previously restricted cryptocurrencies to prevent substantial sell-offs by early investors or […]

title: FTX Shifts Focus: Repayment Over Relaunch
description: In a recent court hearing, bankrupt crypto exchange FTX stated that it intends to repay customers whose crypto deposits were locked when the company filed for bankruptcy in November 2022.

title: Crypto markets at the start of Feb 2024 – Will love and BTC age well?
description: As of the beginning of February 2024, the crypto market is experiencing fluctuations influenced by various factors. The U.S. Federal Reserve’s stance on interest rate hikes has played a pivotal role in impacting the market dynamics, causing significant shifts in crypto values since December 2023. title: Adidas shareholders on edge – 2024 outlook spells trouble for stock prices
description: Adidas, a global sportswear giant, has recently faced a significant downturn in its stock value following a cautious outlook for the year 2024. The company’s shares witnessed a sharp decline after the release of its 2024 forecast, which fell well below analyst expectations.  This unexpected development has sparked concerns among investors and the financial community, […]

title: Ripple CEO denies wallet compromise amid security rumors
description: In a recent statement on X, Ripple CEO Brad Garlinghouse addressed what he called “irresponsible speculation and reporting” surrounding the security of wallets managed by Ripple. Garlinghouse firmly stated, “NO Ripple-managed wallets were compromised. Full stop.” This clarification comes from a security breach involving Ripple co-founder Chris Larsen’s personal XRP accounts, leading to significant cryptocurrency […]

title: Analyst Predicts Bitcoin to Reach Record High in 4 Months; Experts Favor Solana & InQubeta over Cardano
description: The crypto market is buzzing with a fresh wave of excitement. Kevin Svenson, a well-known analyst, is forecasting some pretty bright days ahead for Bitcoin, even suggesting it could hit record highs in the coming months. description: The Federal Reserve maintains the federal funds rate, indicating a cautious stance on economic growth and inflation control. title: Is Zero-Knowledge Tech the Final Piece of the Puzzle for Enhanced Blockchain Privacy?
description: Privacy and security are two words that come up repeatedly during any conversation about blockchain. However, it would be inaccurate to say that blockchain, as a rule, excels or under-delivers in either area.  While measures like hashing algorithms and public/private key pairs are the bedrock of security for distributed ledgers, transactions recorded on public blockchains [...]

title: BlockGuard and Masterblox Forge Strategic Partnership to Revolutionize DeFi Wealth Management
description: BlockGuard, a Web3 innovator building an investment platform to bridge the gap between traditional finance and DeFi, has entered into a strategic partnership with Masterblox. title: XRP Army Gears Up for AMM Integration with Validator Support
description:
Over 68% of XRPL validators have endorsed the AMM amendment. XRP community rallies behind introducing an automated market maker (AMM). This came amid the release of Rippled v2.0.1, bolstering validator confidence. The journey toward introducing an automated market maker (AMM) to XRP’s blockchain is becoming more evident as more network validators have pledged to vote […]
